name: Roller Jump
description:
Controls

  • Left or 'A' to rotate Counterclockwise
  • Right or 'D' to rotate Clockwise
  • Space to Jump

Collect Coins and avoid the enemies, by jumping and rolling around a wheel...

Created for Extra Credits March 2019 Game Jam

Created using Godot

Parallax layers from Kenney under CC0 1.0 Universal

The spinner enemy is also by Kenny and modified in paint.net

All other artwork were all made using paint.net

SFX generated using http://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html

Background Music generated via http://tones.wolfram.com/generate/

Font from https://www.1001fonts.com/fff-forward-font.html which free for commercial use.
